item.description:
FYI - The National Association of Asian-American Professionals (NAAAP) is hosting their annual convention at the Seaport World Trade Center. Included at the convention is a FREE career fair.

 

These days, "diversity" and "inclusion" are big buzz words in the corporate arena. Companies who are interested in hiring Asian-American employees will be showcasing their open positions. Asians who would like to capitalize on this opportunity will definitely want to attend this FREE career fair.

 

This career fair is a two-day event, on Friday + Saturday, from 9:00 AM to 5:00 PM. The cost is FREE.

 Whether you want a new job, or want to move up in your current career path, this FREE career fair is for you. Job seekers are encouraged to pre-register their resume with the NAAAP online Career Center, at http://www.naaap.org/careers. to have their resume circulated to hiring companies.

For more information regarding this annual event, visit http://www.naaapconvention.org. Or, become a member of the local Boston chapter at http://www.naaapboston.org.

group.name: The Greater Boston Asian Professionals Meetup Group

item.name: Attend a FREE Career Fair - Friday & Saturday
